interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers Review Date: 2020/12/22 Store: LOLYSENTA Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'} Review Text: If you have never tried this, you will love it! I use to use the micro needle to my face and love the effects but mine got older and glad I find this set.
PROS
* nice set to gift to your friend/family
* micro needles are sharp and easy to roll on my face
* i love that the micro needle roller is packed in a sterilized bag
* easy to hold and glide on my face
* the pink jade roller rolls softly on my face. The smaller roller feels perfect on my eye areas. I love how it relaxes me. I like to put mine on the fridge for awhile so it feels colder on my skin and after I use it it feels good.

NO CONS YET! I know this kind of stuff takes awhile before you can really see a difference on your skin. If you have never use anything like this give it at least 3 months to see a difference (6 months to really see how much your skin have improved). Make sure you read the instructions to know exactly what to do and not to do. Review Title: Love how it feels on my face Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Travel Bottles for Toiletries, Silicone Travel Size Bottles And Squeezable Containers Holders with belt clip Keychain for Backpack, Shampoo, Liquid, Cosmetic Products(2 oz, 6 Pack) MACRAY {'Brand': 'MACRAY', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 6.61 x 1.61 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '782938308006'} I am very happy when I got this one coz it looks super nice and made of quality material. I got this mostly to hold hand sanitizers for my whole family so we have our own when we are out.

PROS:
* perfect size! If you will travel for a week, this will be enough to hold your stuff.
* the silicone material is very nice, I am very impressed!
* wide mouth
* easy to refill and get your stuff out
* the carabiners are made of high quality metal.
* easy to squeeze (but be careful if it’s a hand sanitizer or water like liquid it will come out very fast so squeeze with caution)

CONS
* The scent of whatever you put leaks out. You will need a a few ziplock bags to contain the scent if you are traveling or else it will be all over your luggage. If you happen to mix it with food items, expect it to taste whatever you put on this bottles.
* don’t use for hand sanitizers or anything with alcohol base on it. I got it mainly for holding hand sanitizers for my whole family but the scent leaks so bad that I have to not use it for the purpose. It is also not good when squeezing coz it will not give you little amount.
* some liquid leaks too.

This product will be good for lotion, toothpaste or shampoo/conditioner coz they have thicker consistency. But be aware that scents leaks. The reason why I gave it 3 stars is because I can’t use it for the purpose I got it for (hand sanitizers)
If you plan to use it thicker liquids and don’t mind the scent leaks then this is perfect coz the silicone material is very nice. BEWARE! Scent Leaks! Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers LOLYSENTA {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'} If you have never tried this, you will love it! I use to use the micro needle to my face and love the effects but mine got older and glad I find this set.
PROS
* nice set to gift to your friend/family
* micro needles are sharp and easy to roll on my face
* i love that the micro needle roller is packed in a sterilized bag
* easy to hold and glide on my face
* the pink jade roller rolls softly on my face. The smaller roller feels perfect on my eye areas. I love how it relaxes me. I like to put mine on the fridge for awhile so it feels colder on my skin and after I use it it feels good.

NO CONS YET! I know this kind of stuff takes awhile before you can really see a difference on your skin. If you have never use anything like this give it at least 3 months to see a difference (6 months to really see how much your skin have improved). Make sure you read the instructions to know exactly what to do and not to do. Love how it feels on my face
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Travel Enthusiast**: The user frequently travels, as indicated by their purchase of travel-sized containers for toiletries, suggesting they prioritize convenience during outings.

- **Preference for Quality and Functionality**: They value durable, well-made items, as evidenced by their admiration for quality materials like silicone and a new appreciation for skincare tools that offer effective results.

- **Family-Oriented Approach**: The user aims to provide for their family's wellness, seen in their choice to purchase hand sanitizers and giftable skincare products, highlighting a focus on practicality for loved ones.

- **Practical User**: They seek functionality and ease of use, demonstrated by their appreciation for products that work well and are reliable. Their high standards are shown by recognizing performance issues like leakage, as well as seeking thoughtful, user-friendly designs in skincare.

- **Sensitivity to Scent**: They are cautious about scent management in products, reflecting a preference for items that maintain integrity and avoid scent leakage.

- **Cautious and Informed Reviewer**: With a preference for methodical evaluations, the user provides detailed pros and cons lists in their reviews, showcasing a thorough approach to decision-making. Their recent experience with skincare tools further emphasizes this diligence in selecting items that deliver tangible benefits over time.

Overall, this user profile reflects a quality-conscious individual who values effective, practical solutions for travel and family wellness while being attentive to performance and user experience.
